messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Want to be filmed for a program on  homeschooling?
messages.msgSnippet: She wasn t able to give me an exact date, but said she will about 2 weeks after filming ... From: awpottle  To:
messages.messageBody:
She wasn't able to give me an exact date, but said she will about 2 weeks
after filming
----- Original Message -----
From: awpottle <awpottle@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 25, 2000 3:51 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Want to be filmed for a program on
homeschooling?


> Hi, will you keep us posted when the show will air?
>
> Wendy
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Many things in life can wait...
> the child cannot.
> Gabriel Mistral, Chilean Poet
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Wendy, Andrew, Ben, Sam & Jack
> Visit our Homeschooling in NB website...
> http://www.homeschoolingnb.com
> Visit our favourite used book
> site...http://welovebooks.com/mapleleaf/Default.htm
>
> Billy or Nancy wrote:
>
> > A few weeks ago I asked if any of you were interested in being
interviewed
> > by Peter Kilborn for a New York Times article on unschooling. By now,
most
> > of you have seen the resulting article
> >
(http://partners.nytimes.com/library/national/052400home-edu.html?Partner).
> >
> > I now have an opportunity for families who are willing to be filmed for
a
> > program on homeschooling by "Extra" - a half hour newsmagazine show that
> > airs all over the country on different networks at various times.
Farrell
> > Roth is looking for a homeschooling family willing to invite a few
people
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Old school buds here:

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Want to be filmed for a program on  homeschooling?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, will you keep us posted when the show will air? Wendy ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Many things in life can wait... the child cannot. Gabriel Mistral,
messages.messageBody:
Hi, will you keep us posted when the show will air?

Wendy
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Many things in life can wait...
the child cannot.
Gabriel Mistral, Chilean Poet
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Wendy, Andrew, Ben, Sam & Jack
Visit our Homeschooling in NB website...
http://www.homeschoolingnb.com
Visit our favourite used book
site...http://welovebooks.com/mapleleaf/Default.htm

Billy or Nancy wrote:

> A few weeks ago I asked if any of you were interested in being interviewed
> by Peter Kilborn for a New York Times article on unschooling. By now, most
> of you have seen the resulting article
> (http://partners.nytimes.com/library/national/052400home-edu.html?Partner).
>
> I now have an opportunity for families who are willing to be filmed for a
> program on homeschooling by "Extra" - a half hour newsmagazine show that
> airs all over the country on different networks at various times. Farrell
> Roth is looking for a homeschooling family willing to invite a few people
